about.title: About me
about.first: Hello, welcome to my blog! My name is Lucas Mallmann. I've been working as a software engineer since 2017. I believe that education, the dissemination of knowledge and good ideas, is the fastest and most effective way to improve the world!
about.second: I currently work as a Software Developer at Globo. I started programming in the year 2016, and my interest in the world of development is only increasing every day! I always try to learn and apply new technologies, which is one of the reasons why I built this blog, because I believe that the best way to learn is to teach.
about.third: I like music a lot, am passionate about games, an adventurer in cooking, and in my free time I love to philosophize about life. Despite being a technology-oriented blog, don't be surprised if we bring some reflections here.
about.fourth: Many dreams and goals of mine were born out of online resources I found about technology. I believe it's my duty, and I'll be extremely happy if I can repay you a little of that learning and what brought me here! #keepgoing.

globo.title: Globo.com
globo.description: I work as a software developer for the third most visited website in Brazil. I work improving ADs performance, webvitals, and AB Testing for new features. I work with the editor's app integration for the website. Globo.com has more than 17 million pageviews everyday.

pling.title: Pling
pling.description: Worked implementing PWA for more than ten web apps, implementing real-time and push notification services for them. Besides, I developed offline support, and also was responsible for the teams's web api.

codeleap.title: Codeleap
codeleap.description: Worked on various projects, developing dark theme support for Bereable.app. Implemented a market place for small products.

climatempo.title: Climatempo
climatempo.description: Responsible for implementing a forest fire history search in the SMAC system, which is used by large clients in order to receive meteorological alerts.

objective.title: Objective
objective.description: Reponsible for implementing automation systems for creating ADs in AdManager. Created the main company website, which helped the employers to manage the clients.

inpe.title: INPE
inpe.description: Worked developing a scientifc article, which was published on 2017. Developed a workflow where the meteorological data was processed using just python instead of Fortran.
